purpose: Facilitate scientific research through the use of virtual lab environments powered by LLM agents
principle: Utilizes Jupyter Notebooks to create interactive and reproducible research workflows enhanced by LLM capabilities
reusability: Designed for integration within Jupyter environments, allowing researchers to adapt and extend functionalities for specific scientific needs
limitations: Primarily focused on Jupyter Notebook environments; may require additional setup for specific scientific domains
name: virtual-lab
description: A virtual lab of LLM agents for science research
highlight: Integration of Large Language Models (LLMs) for scientific research automation
